Books.title: Midnight's Children
Books.description: A postcolonial novel that tells the story of Saleem Sinai, who was born at the exact moment that India gained independence from British colonial rule.

Books.title: The God of Small Things
Books.description: A novel set in Kerala, India that tells the story of the twins Estha and Rahel and their family, exploring themes of love, loss, and social boundaries.

Books.title: A Fine Balance
Books.description: A novel set in India in the mid-1970s, which tells the story of four characters from different backgrounds whose lives intersect during a period of political turmoil.

Books.title: The White Tiger
Books.description: A novel set in modern-day India, which tells the story of Balram Halwai, a poor villager who becomes a successful entrepreneur by any means necessary.

Books.title: The Palace of Illusions
Books.description: A retelling of the Indian epic Mahabharata from the perspective of the female character Draupadi.

Books.title: The Namesake
Books.description: A novel that follows the journey of the Ganguli family, who move from Kolkata to New York City and face challenges in adjusting to a new culture while preserving their Indian heritage.

Books.title: The Interpreter of Maladies
Books.description: A collection of short stories that explore the experiences of Indian immigrants and their children in the United States.
